codeceptionTestAdapter.codeceptPath.desc: Path to Codeception executable. Leave empty to auto-detect (`vendor/bin/codecept`, then `codecept` from `PATH`). Relative paths are resolved from the workspace folder.
codeceptionTestAdapter.reportPath.descri: Path to reports produced by Codeception. Relative paths are resolved from the workspace folder.
codeceptionTestAdapter.reportFormats.des: Which Codeception reports to generate. Multiple report formats can be selected, selecting multiple formats will generate all chosen reports. HTML report is generated but not parsed; test results are parsed only from XML reports.
